import{createClient}from"@supabase/supabase-js";const supabaseUrl=process.env.REACT_APP_SUPABASE_URL;const supabaseKey=process.env.REACT_APP_SUPABASE_ANON_KEY;console.log("üîß Configuraci√≥n de Supabase:");console.log("URL:",supabaseUrl?"‚úÖ Configurada":"‚ùå No configurada");console.log("Key:",supabaseKey?"‚úÖ Configurada":"‚ùå No configurada");if(!supabaseUrl||!supabaseKey){console.error("‚ùå Error: Supabase environment variables are not configured!");console.error("Please create a .env file with the following variables:");console.error("REACT_APP_SUPABASE_URL=your_supabase_project_url");console.error("REACT_APP_SUPABASE_ANON_KEY=your_supabase_anon_key");console.error("You can get these values from your Supabase project settings.");}export const supabase=createClient(supabaseUrl||"https://placeholder.supabase.co",supabaseKey||"placeholder_key");// Funci√≥n para probar la conexi√≥n
export const testConnection=async()=>{try{console.log("üß™ Probando conexi√≥n a Supabase...");const{error}=await supabase.from("tournaments").select("count").limit(1);if(error){console.error("‚ùå Error de conexi√≥n:",error);return false;}console.log("‚úÖ Conexi√≥n exitosa a Supabase");return true;}catch(err){console.error("‚ùå Error de conexi√≥n:",err);return false;}};
